mapper.select: SELECT store_id, roastery_id, owner_id, name, description, address, latitude, longitude, phone_number, category, thumbnail_url, open_time, close_time, average_rating, review_count, visit_count, is_closed, deleted_at, created_at, updated_at FROM stores WHERE latitude BETWEEN #{minLatitude} AND #{maxLatitude} AND longitude BETWEEN #{minLongitude} AND #{maxLongitude} AND deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY created_at DESC
